name: new.ppy.sh dark theme
description: Dark theme for the new version of osu!'s website. Nice on the eyes.
additional_info: RELEASE NOTES v1 - style released v2 - osu! logo changed to grey version, pink top bar changed to grey gradient v3 (09/22/2018) - fixed leaderboard/comment colors on beatmap page, fixed discord content link v4 (01/05/2019) - Fixes to scoreboard and description by Coppertine CONTACT Contact me at: osu: https://osu.ppy.sh/users/8705944 discord: donacdum#5061
